verses.verse: We have heard <WH8085> with our ears, <WH241> God; <WH430> our fathers <WH1> have told <WH5608> us, <WH6467> what work you did <WH6466> in their days, <WH3117> in the days <WH3117> of old. <WH6924>
You drove out <WH3423> the nations <WH1471> with your hand, <WH3027> but you planted <WH5193> them. <WH7489> You afflicted the peoples, <WH3816> but you spread them abroad. <WH7971>

For they didn't <WH3423> get the land <WH776> in possession <WH3423> by their own sword, <WH2719> neither did their own arm <WH2220> save <WH3467> them; <WH3225> but your right hand, and your arm, <WH2220> and the light <WH216> of your face, <WH6440> because you were favorable to them. <WH7521>
You are my King, <WH4428> God. <WH430> Command <WH6680> victories <WH3444> for Jacob! <WH3290>
Through you, <WH5055> will we push down our adversaries. <WH6862> Through your name, <WH8034> will we tread them under <WH947> who rise up against us. <WH6965>
For I will not trust <WH982> in my bow, <WH7198> neither shall my sword <WH2719> save me. <WH3467>
But you have saved <WH3467> us from our adversaries, <WH6862> and have shamed <WH954> those who hate us. <WH8130>
In God <WH430> we have made our boast <WH1984> all day <WH3117> long, <WH3034> we will give thanks to your name <WH8034> forever. <WH5769> Selah. <WH5542>
But <WH637> now you rejected <WH2186> us, <WH3637> and brought us to dishonor, and don't <WH3318> go out with our armies. <WH6635>
You make us turn <WH7725> back <WH268> from the adversary. <WH6862> Those who hate <WH8130> us take spoil for themselves. <WH8154>
You have made <WH5414> us like sheep <WH6629> for food, <WH3978> and have scattered <WH2219> us among the nations. <WH1471>
You sell <WH4376> your people <WH5971> for nothing, <WH1952> and have gained nothing <WH1952> from their sale. <WH4242>
You make <WH7760> us a reproach <WH2781> to our neighbors, <WH7934> a scoffing <WH3933> and a derision <WH7047> to those who are around us. <WH5439>
You make <WH7760> us a byword <WH4912> among the nations, <WH1471> a shaking <WH4493> of the head <WH7218> among the peoples. <WH3816>
All <WH3117> day long my dishonor <WH1322> is before me, <WH1322> and shame covers <WH3680> my face, <WH6440>
At the taunt <WH6963> of one who reproaches <WH2778> and verbally abuses, <WH1442> because <WH6440> of the enemy <WH341> and the avenger. <WH5358>
All this has come <WH935> on us, <WH7911> yet have we not forgotten you, <WH8266> Neither have we been false to your covenant. <WH1285>
Our heart <WH3820> has not turned <WH5472> back, <WH268> neither have our steps <WH838> strayed <WH5186> from your path, <WH734>
Though you have crushed <WH1794> us in the haunt <WH4725> of jackals, <WH8577> and covered <WH3680> us with the shadow of death. <WH6757>
If we have forgotten <WH7911> the name <WH8034> of our God, <WH430> or spread forth <WH6566> our hands <WH3709> to a strange <WH2114> god; <WH410>
won't <WH430> God search this out? <WH2713> For he knows <WH3045> the secrets <WH8587> of the heart. <WH3820>
Yes, <WH2026> for your sake we are killed all day <WH3117> long. <WH2803> We are regarded as sheep <WH6629> for the slaughter. <WH2878>
Wake <WH5782> up! <WH3462> Why do you sleep, Lord? <WH136> Arise! <WH6974> Don't <WH2186> reject us forever. <WH5331>
Why do you hide <WH5641> your face, <WH6440> and forget <WH7911> our affliction <WH6040> and our oppression? <WH3906>
For our soul <WH5315> is bowed down <WH7743> to the dust. <WH6083> Our body <WH990> clings <WH1692> to the earth. <WH776>
Rise <WH6965> up to help <WH5833> us. <WH6299> Redeem us for your loving kindness <WH2617>' sake.
